name: MountPath
desc: The mount point where the virtual file system gets mounted. can be a driver letter (M:\\) or an empty NTFS folder.

name: BlobStorePath
desc: The path to the blob store.

name: SingleThreaded
desc: Only use a single thread to process events. This is highly not recommended as can easily create a bottleneck.

name: DebugApp
desc: Enable debug output to an attached debugger.

name: EnableStdErr
desc: Enable debug output to stderr.

name: UseRemovableDrive
desc: Show device as removable media.

name: ReadOnly
desc: Read only filesystem.

name: EnableCaseSensitive
desc: Supports case-sensitive file names.

name: UseMountManager
desc: Register device to Windows mount manager. This enables advanced Windows features like recycle bin and more...

name: EnableForCurrentSessionOnly
desc: Device only visible for current user session.

name: ShowAsNetworkDevice
desc: Show device as network device with a UNC name. (eg. \\myfs\\fs1)

name: EnableCallerUser
desc: Impersonate Caller User when getting the handle in CreateFileW for operations. This option requires administrator right to work properly.

name: AllocationUnitSize
desc: Allocation Unit Size of the volume. This will behave on the disk file size.

name: SectorSize
desc: Sector Size of the volume. This will behave on the disk file size.

name: EnableLockMode
desc: Enable Lockfile/Unlockfile operations. Otherwise Dokan will take care of it.

name: Timeout
desc: Timeout in Milliseconds. Timeout until a running operation is aborted and the device is unmounted.

name: HelpAntiVirus
desc: Enabled FCB GCt. Might speed up on env with filter drivers (Anti-virus) slowing down the system. (Unsupported)

name: AllowUnmount
desc: Allows unmounting network drive from file explorer.

name: EnableDriverLogs
desc: Forward Driver logs to userland.

name: VolumeName
desc: Personalize the volume name.
